import React from 'react' const DashTable = (props) => { const {candidateData} = props return (
{candidateData.length>0 && candidateData.map(ele=>{ return ( ) })}
Name Technical Skills Experience Applied Date View Details Update Application Status Update Application Status
{ele.name} {ele.skills} {ele.experience} {new Date(ele.createdAt).getDate()}/ {new Date(ele.createdAt).getMonth()+1}/ {new Date(ele.createdAt).getFullYear()}
) } export default DashTable
